Objective/Description: Ensure 100% compliant and timely month-end closing and tax filing for TBWA SMP Finance.
Indicators: On-time Submission Rate: 92% (Target: 100%), BIR Compliance Rate: 100% (Target: 100%)
Means of Verification: Approved BIR receipts, External audit reports, Internal compliance tracker
Assumptions: Finance systems remain stable, Government portals operational, Regulatory requirements unchanged

Objective/Description: Streamlined coordination between Finance Payroll Tax and Treasury teams.
Indicators: Average Process Delay: 0.3 days (Target: <1 day), Team Collaboration Score: 87% (Target: 90%)
Means of Verification: Task tracker completion logs, Notion workflow logs, Team survey results
Assumptions: All teams follow established deadlines, Communication channels remain effective, Resources adequately allocated

Objective/Description: Accurate and timely closing of books and reconciliations including journal entries accruals WIP and TB sign-off.
Indicators: TB Reconciliation Rate: 98% (Target: 100%), Number of Closing Adjustments: 8 (Target: <10), Days to Close: 7.3 WD (Target: 7 WD)
Means of Verification: Reconciliation sheets, GL transaction logs, TB sign-off documents, Audit trail reports
Assumptions: Source data complete and accurate, All entries reviewed by deadline, System uptime maintained, No major unexpected transactions

Objective/Description: Complete on-time tax filing for payroll VAT and withholding taxes.
Indicators: BIR Filing Timeliness: 100% (Target: 100%), Tax Calculation Accuracy: 99.5% (Target: 100%)
Means of Verification: BIR confirmation receipts, eFPS filing screenshots, Tax filing tracker
Assumptions: Government portals operational, Tax rates and regulations stable, Supporting documentation complete

Objective/Description: 1. Journal entries and accruals finalized | 2. WIP schedule reconciled | 3. TB reviewed and approved
Means of Verification: Completed task count per calendar, Monthly compliance sheet, WBS Master task log
Assumptions: Timely reviews and approvals, Supporting documents available

Objective/Description: 1. All BIR forms filed | 2. Tax payments processed | 3. Receipts archived
Means of Verification: Filing rate vs deadline tracker, BIR portal confirmations, Tax compliance sheet
Assumptions: Portals accessible during filing window, Payment systems operational

Objective/Description: - Reconcile ledgers (Phase I) | - Post accruals (Phase II) | - Prepare WIP and TB (Phase III) | - Finalize balances (Phase IV) | - Approve entries (TB Sign-off)
Means of Verification: Month-close calendar, Full Task Schedule, WBS Master progress tracking
Assumptions: No data loss or corruption, Team availability maintained, No system downtime

Objective/Description: - Compute VAT (CT-0003 CT-0004) | - Prepare 1601C 0619E forms | - Route for approvals | - File returns via eFPS | - Upload proof of filing
Means of Verification: Tax filing tracker, Task completion logs, eFPS transaction history
Assumptions: eFPS portals accessible, Tax calculations verified, Approvers available
